title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 304 and H.R. 3031 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
November 17, 2017
On Friday, November 17, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 304, the “Protecting Patient Access to Emergency Medications Act of 2017,” which authorizes the Department of Justice to register certain providers of emergency medical services to dispense controlled substances; andH.R. 3031, the “TSP Modernization Act of 2017,” which provides flexibility in making withdrawals from a Thrift Savings Plan account.
